IRQ

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xf4
Size:
0x4
Source:
salida.rdl

Description

Interrupt Requests Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:5] reserved7 r 0x0 reserved7
[4] MAX_DROP w, woclr 0x0 MAX_DROP
[3] TX_FIFO_FULL w, woclr 0x0 TX_FIFO_FULL
[2] TX_FIFO_EMPTY w, woclr 0x0 TX_FIFO_EMPTY
[1] RX_FIFO_FULL w, woclr 0x0 RX_FIFO_FULL
[0] RX_FIFO_EMPTY w, woclr 0x0 RX_FIFO_EMPTY

Field Descriptions

reserved7 - reserved7

Reserved field

MAX_DROP - MAX_DROP

STATUS.CNT_DROP reached its maximum value

TX_FIFO_FULL - TX_FIFO_FULL

TX FIFO became full (sticky).

TX_FIFO_EMPTY - TX_FIFO_EMPTY

TX FIFO became empty (sticky)

RX_FIFO_FULL - RX_FIFO_FULL

RX FIFO became full (sticky)

RX_FIFO_EMPTY - RX_FIFO_EMPTY

RX FIFO became empty (sticky)
